name: Whitehaven Beach All Day!
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Whitehaven Beach All Day! ===
1. Whitehaven Beach All Day
2. Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling
3. Sea and Sky Combo
Airlie Beach Scenic Flight Package
Terms and conditions of travel
Refund & Cancellation Policy
Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise
Whitehaven Beach All Day!
Whitehaven Beach all-day adventure
onboard Super Flyer! With unlimited transfers between the boat and beach all day! It’s a Whitsundays First!  Tickets include an
that blends comfort, adventure, and relaxation.
What’s Included on Your Whitehaven Beach Adventure?
– Chill out on the iconic white sands of Whitehaven Beach or sunlounges on the boat.
– Hop on and off the boat at your leisure.
– Enjoy a delicious spread served onboard.
South Whitehaven Lookout Walk
– Discover breathtaking views of the beach and surrounding islands.
– Not included in this ticket. Upgrade your adventure to explore vibrant coral reefs.
✅ Both Ticket Options (Whitehaven Beach All Day and Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkel) will
depart and return to Airlie Beach together
on the same boat , ensuring a
seamless experience for all guests
Whitehaven Beach All Day
Adults From $229 | Children 4+ $179 | Age 1 to 3 Free
Spend your day lounging on the pristine sands of Whitehaven Beach, discover the South Whitehaven Lookout, and enjoy the comforts of the boat with unlimited beach-to-boat transfers.
South Whitehaven Beach + South Lookout
Full details are available on the product page.
On-Demand Transfers Between Boat And Beach
2 Outdoor Sun Lounge Areas
Ticket Price Incudes  Lunch, Snacks, Stinger Suit
100% Refund up to 24 hours before departure.
The Boat ” Super Flyer “
Originally named Susie O’Neill
Experience adventure and comfort aboard
, sun lounges, an onboard bar, and three bathrooms for maximum comfort. Its advanced navigation, radar, and auto-pilot ensure safe, smooth journeys. Super Flyer offers unlimited
, guided walks, snorkelling adventures, and buffet lunches, making every tour unforgettable.
Built for performance and guest comfort
, Super Flyer delivers fast, exciting, and memorable Whitsundays experiences.
Large inside area with comfortable seating
2 Outside Seating Areas
Adults Only Area Outside On Top Deck
Onboard Bar (pay onboard)
Coffee Machine (pay onboard)
Whitehaven Beach All Day Ticket Details!
Ready to explore one of the world’s most iconic beaches in style? Welcome aboard, Super Flyer, your floating beach club for the day! Imagine cruising through the turquoise waters of the Whitsundays, feeling the salty breeze on your face, and knowing you’re about to set foot on the pure, white silica sands of Whitehaven Beach. Sounds like a dream, right? Let’s make it a reality!
Unlimited Beach Transfers (Because Who Wants to Wait?)
With Super Flyer, you can head to the beach or back to the boat whenever you fancy. Forget schedules, this is your day, your way.
Need a top-up on sunscreen? Fancy a cold drink from the onboard bar? No worries! The crew’s got you covered with all-day, on-demand transfers.
Whether you’re a swimmer, a sunbather, or a sandcastle architect, there’s space for everyone. And let’s be honest, how often do you get to say, “I spent my day on one of the top beaches in the world”?
Take the Walk to South Whitehaven Lookout (Trust Us, It’s Worth It)
Picture this: you’re standing at the South Whitehaven Lookout, taking in panoramic views of the beach and the endless view of the ocean and the Islands. It’s the kind of view that makes you stop and say, “Wow… just wow.”
The walk is guided, so you’ll get some cool stories along the way. Plus, it’s a great way to stretch your legs and work up an appetite for what’s coming next.
Delicious Buffet Lunch (Because Adventure Makes You Hungry)
There’s nothing worse than being hungry on a day out, we get it. That’s why we’ve got a tasty buffet lunch waiting for you onboard Super Flyer. Think fresh, wholesome dishes that’ll keep you fueled for more exploring.
We’re talking salads, meats, veggies, and a selection of snacks to keep you going. Trust us, you won’t be going hungry 
=== TOUR END: Whitehaven Beach All Day! ===

raw_html:
• Home
  • Ticket Options
    • 1. Whitehaven Beach All Day
    • 2. Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling
    • 3. Sea and Sky Combo
  • Destinations

name: Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling ===
1. Whitehaven Beach All Day
2. Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling
3. Sea and Sky Combo
Airlie Beach Scenic Flight Package
Terms and conditions of travel
Refund & Cancellation Policy
Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise
Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling
1 Boat – 2 Ticket Options
1. Whitehaven Beach Plus 1 Snorkel (details below)
2. Whitehaven Beach All Day (No Snorkel,
All tickets travel on the same boat
Everyone gets the same incredible experience at Whitehaven Beach
Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkel
onboard Super Flyer! With unlimited transfers between the boat and beach all day! Tickets include an
What’s Included on Your Whitehaven Beach Adventure?
– Snorkel coral reefs in the Whitsunday Islands. Get picked up from Super Flyer on our fast 30 person dedicated snorkelling boat.
– Chill out on the iconic white sands of Whitehaven Beach or sunlounges on the boat.
– Hop on and off the boat at your leisure.
– Enjoy a delicious spread served onboard.
South Whitehaven Lookout Walk
– Discover breathtaking views of the beach and surrounding islands.
✅ Both Ticket Options (Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkel and Whitehaven Beach All Day) will
depart and return to Airlie Beach together
on the same boat , ensuring a
seamless experience for all guests
Whitehaven Beach Plus 1 Snorkel Location
Adults From (15+) $259
Children (4 to 14) $199 | Infants 3 Months to 3 Free.
INFANTS NOTE: Parents will be split over 2 different snorkelling sessions
Get the best of both worlds with ZigZag Whitsundays’ Whitehaven Beach + Snorkel Tour! Up to 2.5 Hours Whitehaven Beach Full Day Tour—plus an unforgettable snorkelling experience.
1 Snorkelling Location On Coral Reef
Full details are available on the product page.
South Whitehaven Beach + South Lookout
On-Demand Transfers Between Boat And Beach
2 Outdoor Sun Lounge Areas
Ticket Price Includes Lunch, Snacks , Stinger Suit and Snorkel Equipment
100% Refund up to 24 hours before departure.
The Boat ” Super Flyer “
Originally named Susie O’Neill
Experience adventure and comfort aboard
, sun lounges, an onboard bar, and three bathrooms for maximum comfort. Its advanced navigation, radar ensure safe, smooth journeys. Super Flyer offers unlimited
, guided walks, snorkelling adventures, and buffet lunches, making every tour unforgettable.
Built for performance and guest comfort
, Super Flyer delivers fast, exciting, and memorable Whitsundays experiences.
Large inside area with comfortable seating
2 Outside Seating Areas
Adults Only Area Outside On Top Deck
Onboard Bar (pay onboard)
Coffee Machine (pay onboard)
Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkel Ticket Details!
Ready to explore one of the world’s most iconic beaches and coral reefs in style? Welcome aboard Super Flyer , your floating beach club for the day! Imagine cruising through the turquoise waters of the Whitsundays, feeling the salty breeze on your face, and knowing you’re about to step foot on the pure, white silica sands of Whitehaven Beach. Sounds like a dream, right? Let’s make it a reality!
Snorkelling Adventure at a Coral Reef Location
Ready to discover what lies beneath the turquoise waters of the Whitsunday Islands? Our dedicated snorkelling boat will pick you up from Super Flyer and take you to a coral reef location known for its vibrant marine life and stunning coral formations. Whether you’re a seasoned snorkeller or a first-timer, you’re in for a treat!
Don’t worry if you’re new to snorkelling; our friendly crew will provide all the gear, including masks, snorkels, flippers, wetsuits and floating devices like pool noodles and lifejackets if needed.
Unlimited Beach Transfers (Because Who Wants to Wait?)
With Super Flyer, you can head to the beach or back to the boat whenever you fancy. Forget schedules, this is your day, your way.
Need a top-up on sunscreen? Fancy a cold drink from the onboard bar? No worries! The crew’s got you covered with all-day, on-demand transfers.
Whether you’re a swimmer, a sunbather, or a sandcastle architect, there’s space for everyone. And let’
=== TOUR END: Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling ===
[ALL PRICE LINES FOUND IN HTML:]

name: Whitehaven Beach Tour
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Whitehaven Beach Tour ===
1. Whitehaven Beach All Day
2. Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling
3. Sea and Sky Combo
Airlie Beach Scenic Flight Package
Terms and conditions of travel
Refund & Cancellation Policy
Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise
© ZigZag Whitsundays Official Website
The world-famous Whitehaven Beach is part of the Whitsunday Islands National Park in Queensland. Because it is located away from the mainland and the wider community, its natural beauty remains intact.
6 Different Tour Options To See Whitehaven Beach
There are only 4 ways to discover Whitehaven Beach on a tour
First, let’s explore the boat option with ZigZag Whitsundays Day Tour on Super Flyer.
ZigZag Whitsundays Whitehaven Beach Tour
Whitehaven Beach All Day
Adults From $229 | Children 4+ $179 | Age 1 to 3 Free
4 to 5 Hours at Whitehaven Beach! Spend your day lounging on the pristine sands of Whitehaven Beach, discover the South Whitehaven Lookout, and enjoy the comforts of the boat with on-demand water taxi between the Boat & Whitehaven Beach
South Whitehaven Beach + South Lookout
Full details are available on the product page.
On-Demand Water Taxi Between Boat And Beach
2 Outdoor Sun Lounge Areas
Ticket Price Includes  Lunch, Snacks, Stinger Suit
100% Refund up to 24 hours before departure.
Whitehaven Beach Plus 1 Snorkel Location
Adults From $259 | Children 5+ $199
Get the best of both worlds with ZigZag Whitsundays’ Whitehaven Beach + Snorkel Tour! Enjoy over 2 hours at Whitehaven Beach including the South Lookout.—plus an unforgettable snorkelling experience.
1 Snorkelling Location On Coral Reef
Ticket Price Includes Lunch, Snacks , Stinger Suit and Snorkel Equipment
Sea and Sky Combo – Beach And Snorkel
Adults From $469 | Children $449
Experience the best of the Whitsundays by Sea and Sky with this ultimate combo! Spend the day exploring
aboard Super Flyer. Top it off with a
t over the Whitsundays, including breathtaking views of the Great Barrier Reef, Heart Reef, and Hill Inlet.
Ticket For Our Whitehaven Beach Plus 1 Snorkel Location
Open Dated Ticket For 60 Minute Scenic Flight With FlyAus
Guaranteed Window Seat (Flight)
Snorkelling Included On Boat Tour
Both Tours Can Not Be Taken On Same Day.
The ‘Book Now’ button will take you to Fly Australia’s Website, where you can book this combo. Once you have booked, please follow the instructions in the email to book your boat tour with us
The Boat ” Super Flyer “
Originally named Susie O’Neill
Experience adventure and comfort aboard
, sun lounges, an onboard bar, and two bathrooms for maximum comfort. Its advanced navigation and radar ensure safe, smooth journeys. Super Flyer offers unlimited
, guided walks, snorkelling adventures, and buffet lunches, making every tour unforgettable.
Built for performance and guest comfort
, Super Flyer delivers fast, exciting, and memorable Whitsundays experiences.
Large inside area with comfortable seating
2 Outside Seating Areas
Adults Only Area Outside On Top Deck
Onboard Bar (pay onboard)
Coffee Machine (pay onboard)
Small Family Business With A Big Boat!
ZigZag Whitsundays and Super Flyer are proudly owned and operated by a local family from Airlie Beach, Queensland. We’re passionate about creating a fun, family-style experience that sets us apart from corporate-run tours. Our crew members are handpicked for their love of the ocean, nature, people and the islands Step aboard and discover why our guests leave such glowing reviews—we’re all about authentic, down-to-earth adventures with a personal touch.
Depart from Coral Sea Marina, Airlie Beach.
Enjoy a guided walk to the
and relax on the beach.
Snorkel Stop (if applicable)
: Explore the vibrant coral reefs of the Whitsundays.
Savor a fresh buffet lunch prepared onboard.
Arrive back at Coral Sea Marina at approximately 5:00 PM.
Why Choose ZigZag Whitsundays?
Our knowledgeable crew will enhance your experience with fun and informative commentary.
We actively participate in conservation programs for the Great Barrier Reef.
Experience breathtaki
=== TOUR END: Whitehaven Beach Tour ===
[ALL PRICE LINES FOUND IN HTML:]

"}},{"@type":"Question","name":"HOW FAR IS THE SOUTH LOOKOUT WALK","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"This walk is 900 meters in each direction, its normally a 45 minute round trip including time at the top"}},{"@type":"Question","name":"WHY IS IT CALLED WHITEHAVEN BEACH","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"The beach was identified and discovered in 1879 by Staff Commander EP Bedwell. © ZigZag Whitsundays Official Website
Looking for the best Airlie Beach snorkelling tour ? ZigZag Whitsundays offers daily departures from Coral Sea Marina, Airlie Beach, combining snorkelling, Whitehaven Beach, and the South Whitehaven Lookout for an unforgettable adventure.
Top-quality snorkel equipment is provided in the price and includes
Flotation devices if necessary.
Snorkelling Adventures – Perfect for Everyone
Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkel
Get the best of both worlds with ZigZag Whitsundays’ Whitehaven Beach + Snorkel Tour! Enjoy over 2 hours at Whitehaven Beach including the South Lookout, plus an unforgettable snorkelling experience.
Sea & Sky Combo - Whitehaven + Snorkel
Whitehaven Beach All Day
Our Airlie Beach snorkelling tour is designed to cater to all experience levels. Guests booked for snorkelling will be picked up from
by the original ZigZag fast boat, featuring
, padded seats, and easy front boarding stairs for seamless water access.
of snorkelling at a prime Whitsundays reef location, handpicked by our experienced crew based on the day’s wind, tides, and conditions. Expect to see vibrant coral gardens, tropical fish, turtles, and even Nemo!
Why Choose Super Flyer for Snorkelling?
Travelling with non-snorkellers? No problem! Guests can choose
Whitehaven Beach All-Day Tickets
while snorkellers enjoy their underwater adventure—everyone stays on the same tour!
Super Flyer features air-conditioned indoor seating, sun lounges, and an onboard bar for ultimate comfort.
We provide premium gear, including
Tusa silicone masks, wetsuits, snorkels
for the best underwater experience.
Meet at Coral Sea Marina, Airlie Beach.
Enjoy a guided walk to the
, explore the beach, and relax.
Snorkel at a prime reef location for 60 minutes.
Freshly prepared and served onboard.
Arrive back at Coral Sea Marina by approximately
Why Snorkel with ZigZag Whitsundays?
Professional, friendly crew with expert local knowledge.
Flotation devices and crew monitoring ensure safety at all times.
Active participants in Great Barrier Reef conservation projects.
What’s Included on your Airlie Beach Snorkelling Tour?
✅ Professional snorkel gear (mask, snorkel, fins, wetsuit)
✅ Flotation devices and rescue boards
✅ Buffet lunch and snacks
✅ Fully guided snorkelling experience
✅ Transfers between Super Flyer and snorkel site
✅ Onboard bar and sun lounges for non-snorkellers
The Boat ” Super Flyer “
Originally named Susie O’Neill
Experience adventure and comfort aboard
, sun lounges, an onboard bar, and two bathrooms for maximum comfort. Its advanced navigation and radar ensure safe, smooth journeys. Super Flyer offers unlimited
, guided walks, snorkelling adventures, and buffet lunches, making every tour unforgettable.
Built for performance and guest comfort
, Super Flyer delivers fast, exciting, and memorable Whitsundays experiences.
Large inside area with comfortable seating
Full details are available on the product page.
2 Outside Seating Areas
Adults Only Area Outside On Top Deck
Onboard Bar (pay onboard)
Coffee Machine (pay onboard)
Small Family Business With A Big Boat!
ZigZag Whitsundays and Super Flyer are proudly owned and operated by a local family from Airlie Beach, Queensland. We’re passionate about creating a fun, family-style experience that sets us apart from corporate-run tours. Our crew members are handpicked for their love of the ocean, nature, people and the islands Step aboard and discover why our guests leave such glowing reviews—we’re all about authentic, down-to-earth adventures with a personal touch.
Depart from Coral Sea Marina, Airlie Beach.
and relax on the beach.

: Explore the vibrant coral reefs of the Whitsundays.

The company is independently owned and sells over 98% of its tickets online, without reliance on traditional travel agents. • Home

    • 3. Sea and Sky Combo
  • Destinations

name: Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise ===
1. Whitehaven Beach All Day
2. Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling
3. Sea and Sky Combo
Airlie Beach Scenic Flight Package
Terms and conditions of travel
Refund & Cancellation Policy
Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise
Operated by Whisper Cruises
Phone – 0466 002 829
Bookings Here or Book Now buttons on this page
Welcome to the perfect
Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise.
Here you can make direct live bookings for the ultimate twilight cruise that is eco-friendly and whisper Quiet.
Departing at 5:30 pm from Coral Sea Marina Northern Village this stunning boat will take you for a cruise in front of Airlie Beach where you can snack on nibbles and enjoy a complimentary glass of bubbles. As night falls the night lights of Airlie Beach will light up the bay as you cruise quietly on the electric boat, you will then return to Airlie Beach around 7.30 pm
This feature is included
Whisper Quiet Electric Boat
Take your family or friends
Up to 10 people
Contact us today to discuss your requirements
More Detailed Information For This Cruise
Introducing Tallulah – completely run-on electricity, she is an eco-friendly option for small gatherings of up to 10 people.
With a comfortable lounge-style open plan, pillows, and plenty of shade cover, this is the perfect way to end a day watching the sun go down in Airlie Beach
Environmentally responsible luxury electric boat
• All-weather protection (wind, rain and sun)
• Stable – Perfect for all ages and abilities
• Calm water cruising
(perfect for those who fear seasickness)
• Intimate and fun
• A touch of luxury and appointed for comfort
• Drinks packages available
• Up to 8 guests
• Private charters welcomed
This Airlie Beach Sunset cruise departs from Coral Sea Marina
which is the vibrant centre of our marine industry. Boasting cafes, restaurants, and bars this marina is a destination in itself.
Please meet outside Serrontos restaurant 10 minutes before departure
How To Book Our Sunset Cruise Departing Airlie Beach
This Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise availability is always live and bookings can be made 24 hours a day. See our availability and booking calendar below
ZigZag Whitsundays Products and Packages
70 Minute Scenic Flight + Day Tour
Meeting Point ” D “
Airlie Beach. QLD 4802
Copyright 2024 | designed by
Nath J at Ripple Effect Online
Ticket Options On Super Flyer
Sea & Sky Combo Snorkel

name: Whitehaven Beach All Day!
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Whitehaven Beach All Day! ===
1. Whitehaven Beach All Day
2. Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling
3. Sea and Sky Combo
Airlie Beach Scenic Flight Package
Terms and conditions of travel
Refund & Cancellation Policy
Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise
Whitehaven Beach All Day!
Whitehaven Beach all-day adventure
onboard Super Flyer! With unlimited transfers between the boat and beach all day! It’s a Whitsundays First!  Tickets include an
that blends comfort, adventure, and relaxation.
What’s Included on Your Whitehaven Beach Adventure?
– Chill out on the iconic white sands of Whitehaven Beach or sunlounges on the boat.
– Hop on and off the boat at your leisure.
– Enjoy a delicious spread served onboard.
South Whitehaven Lookout Walk
– Discover breathtaking views of the beach and surrounding islands.
– Not included in this ticket. Upgrade your adventure to explore vibrant coral reefs.
✅ Both Ticket Options (Whitehaven Beach All Day and Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkel) will
depart and return to Airlie Beach together
on the same boat , ensuring a
seamless experience for all guests
Whitehaven Beach All Day
Adults From $229 | Children 4+ $179 | Age 1 to 3 Free
Spend your day lounging on the pristine sands of Whitehaven Beach, discover the South Whitehaven Lookout, and enjoy the comforts of the boat with unlimited beach-to-boat transfers.
South Whitehaven Beach + South Lookout
Full details are available on the product page.
On-Demand Transfers Between Boat And Beach
2 Outdoor Sun Lounge Areas
Ticket Price Incudes  Lunch, Snacks, Stinger Suit
100% Refund up to 24 hours before departure.
The Boat ” Super Flyer “
Originally named Susie O’Neill
Experience adventure and comfort aboard
, sun lounges, an onboard bar, and three bathrooms for maximum comfort. Its advanced navigation, radar, and auto-pilot ensure safe, smooth journeys. Super Flyer offers unlimited
, guided walks, snorkelling adventures, and buffet lunches, making every tour unforgettable.
Built for performance and guest comfort
, Super Flyer delivers fast, exciting, and memorable Whitsundays experiences.
Large inside area with comfortable seating
2 Outside Seating Areas
Adults Only Area Outside On Top Deck
Onboard Bar (pay onboard)
Coffee Machine (pay onboard)
Whitehaven Beach All Day Ticket Details!
Ready to explore one of the world’s most iconic beaches in style? Welcome aboard, Super Flyer, your floating beach club for the day! Imagine cruising through the turquoise waters of the Whitsundays, feeling the salty breeze on your face, and knowing you’re about to set foot on the pure, white silica sands of Whitehaven Beach. Sounds like a dream, right? Let’s make it a reality!
Unlimited Beach Transfers (Because Who Wants to Wait?)
With Super Flyer, you can head to the beach or back to the boat whenever you fancy. Forget schedules, this is your day, your way.
Need a top-up on sunscreen? Fancy a cold drink from the onboard bar? No worries! The crew’s got you covered with all-day, on-demand transfers.
Whether you’re a swimmer, a sunbather, or a sandcastle architect, there’s space for everyone. And let’s be honest, how often do you get to say, “I spent my day on one of the top beaches in the world”?
Take the Walk to South Whitehaven Lookout (Trust Us, It’s Worth It)
Picture this: you’re standing at the South Whitehaven Lookout, taking in panoramic views of the beach and the endless view of the ocean and the Islands. It’s the kind of view that makes you stop and say, “Wow… just wow.”
The walk is guided, so you’ll get some cool stories along the way. Plus, it’s a great way to stretch your legs and work up an appetite for what’s coming next.
Delicious Buffet Lunch (Because Adventure Makes You Hungry)
There’s nothing worse than being hungry on a day out, we get it. That’s why we’ve got a tasty buffet lunch waiting for you onboard Super Flyer. Think fresh, wholesome dishes that’ll keep you fueled for more exploring.
We’re talking salads, meats, veggies, and a selection of snacks to keep you going. Trust us, you won’t be going hungry 
=== TOUR END: Whitehaven Beach All Day! ===
[ALL PRICE LINES FOUND IN HTML:]

name: Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling ===
1. Whitehaven Beach All Day
2. Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling
3. Sea and Sky Combo
Airlie Beach Scenic Flight Package
Terms and conditions of travel
Refund & Cancellation Policy
Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise
Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling
1 Boat – 2 Ticket Options
1. Whitehaven Beach Plus 1 Snorkel (details below)
2. Whitehaven Beach All Day (No Snorkel,
All tickets travel on the same boat
Everyone gets the same incredible experience at Whitehaven Beach
Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkel
onboard Super Flyer! With unlimited transfers between the boat and beach all day! Tickets include an
What’s Included on Your Whitehaven Beach Adventure?
– Snorkel coral reefs in the Whitsunday Islands. Get picked up from Super Flyer on our fast 30 person dedicated snorkelling boat.
– Chill out on the iconic white sands of Whitehaven Beach or sunlounges on the boat.
– Hop on and off the boat at your leisure.
– Enjoy a delicious spread served onboard.
South Whitehaven Lookout Walk
– Discover breathtaking views of the beach and surrounding islands.
✅ Both Ticket Options (Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkel and Whitehaven Beach All Day) will
depart and return to Airlie Beach together
on the same boat , ensuring a
seamless experience for all guests
Whitehaven Beach Plus 1 Snorkel Location
Adults From (15+) $259
Children (4 to 14) $199 | Infants 3 Months to 3 Free.
INFANTS NOTE: Parents will be split over 2 different snorkelling sessions
Get the best of both worlds with ZigZag Whitsundays’ Whitehaven Beach + Snorkel Tour! Up to 2.5 Hours Whitehaven Beach Full Day Tour—plus an unforgettable snorkelling experience.
1 Snorkelling Location On Coral Reef
Full details are available on the product page.
South Whitehaven Beach + South Lookout
On-Demand Transfers Between Boat And Beach
2 Outdoor Sun Lounge Areas
Ticket Price Includes Lunch, Snacks , Stinger Suit and Snorkel Equipment
100% Refund up to 24 hours before departure.
The Boat ” Super Flyer “
Originally named Susie O’Neill
Experience adventure and comfort aboard
, sun lounges, an onboard bar, and three bathrooms for maximum comfort. Its advanced navigation, radar ensure safe, smooth journeys. Super Flyer offers unlimited
, guided walks, snorkelling adventures, and buffet lunches, making every tour unforgettable.
Built for performance and guest comfort
, Super Flyer delivers fast, exciting, and memorable Whitsundays experiences.
Large inside area with comfortable seating
2 Outside Seating Areas
Adults Only Area Outside On Top Deck
Onboard Bar (pay onboard)
Coffee Machine (pay onboard)
Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkel Ticket Details!
Ready to explore one of the world’s most iconic beaches and coral reefs in style? Welcome aboard Super Flyer , your floating beach club for the day! Imagine cruising through the turquoise waters of the Whitsundays, feeling the salty breeze on your face, and knowing you’re about to step foot on the pure, white silica sands of Whitehaven Beach. Sounds like a dream, right? Let’s make it a reality!
Snorkelling Adventure at a Coral Reef Location
Ready to discover what lies beneath the turquoise waters of the Whitsunday Islands? Our dedicated snorkelling boat will pick you up from Super Flyer and take you to a coral reef location known for its vibrant marine life and stunning coral formations. Whether you’re a seasoned snorkeller or a first-timer, you’re in for a treat!
Don’t worry if you’re new to snorkelling; our friendly crew will provide all the gear, including masks, snorkels, flippers, wetsuits and floating devices like pool noodles and lifejackets if needed.
Unlimited Beach Transfers (Because Who Wants to Wait?)
With Super Flyer, you can head to the beach or back to the boat whenever you fancy. Forget schedules, this is your day, your way.
Need a top-up on sunscreen? Fancy a cold drink from the onboard bar? No worries! The crew’s got you covered with all-day, on-demand transfers.
Whether you’re a swimmer, a sunbather, or a sandcastle architect, there’s space for everyone. And let’
=== TOUR END: Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling ===
[ALL PRICE LINES FOUND IN HTML:]

The company operates a full-day boat tour to Whitehaven Beach aboard the custom-designed high-speed catamaran, Super Flyer. ZigZag Whitsundays specialises in Great Barrier Reef Marine Park experiences, including access to Whitehaven Beach, South Whitehaven Lookout, and guided snorkelling at fringing coral reefs around the Whitsunday Islands. The company is independently owned and sells over 98% of its tickets online, without reliance on traditional travel agents. • Home
  • Ticket Options
    • 1. Whitehaven Beach All Day
    • 2. Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling
    • 3. Sea and Sky Combo
  • Destinations
    • Whitehaven Beach

name: Whitehaven Beach Tour
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Whitehaven Beach Tour ===
1. Whitehaven Beach All Day
2. Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling
3. Sea and Sky Combo
Airlie Beach Scenic Flight Package
Terms and conditions of travel
Refund & Cancellation Policy
Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise
© ZigZag Whitsundays Official Website
The world-famous Whitehaven Beach is part of the Whitsunday Islands National Park in Queensland. Because it is located away from the mainland and the wider community, its natural beauty remains intact.
6 Different Tour Options To See Whitehaven Beach
There are only 4 ways to discover Whitehaven Beach on a tour
First, let’s explore the boat option with ZigZag Whitsundays Day Tour on Super Flyer.
ZigZag Whitsundays Whitehaven Beach Tour
Whitehaven Beach All Day
Adults From $229 | Children 4+ $179 | Age 1 to 3 Free
4 to 5 Hours at Whitehaven Beach! Spend your day lounging on the pristine sands of Whitehaven Beach, discover the South Whitehaven Lookout, and enjoy the comforts of the boat with on-demand water taxi between the Boat & Whitehaven Beach
South Whitehaven Beach + South Lookout
Full details are available on the product page.
On-Demand Water Taxi Between Boat And Beach
2 Outdoor Sun Lounge Areas
Ticket Price Includes  Lunch, Snacks, Stinger Suit
100% Refund up to 24 hours before departure.
Whitehaven Beach Plus 1 Snorkel Location
Adults From $259 | Children 5+ $199
Get the best of both worlds with ZigZag Whitsundays’ Whitehaven Beach + Snorkel Tour! Enjoy over 2 hours at Whitehaven Beach including the South Lookout.—plus an unforgettable snorkelling experience.
1 Snorkelling Location On Coral Reef
Ticket Price Includes Lunch, Snacks , Stinger Suit and Snorkel Equipment
Sea and Sky Combo – Beach And Snorkel
Adults From $469 | Children $449
Experience the best of the Whitsundays by Sea and Sky with this ultimate combo! Spend the day exploring
aboard Super Flyer. Top it off with a
t over the Whitsundays, including breathtaking views of the Great Barrier Reef, Heart Reef, and Hill Inlet.
Ticket For Our Whitehaven Beach Plus 1 Snorkel Location
Open Dated Ticket For 60 Minute Scenic Flight With FlyAus
Guaranteed Window Seat (Flight)
Snorkelling Included On Boat Tour
Both Tours Can Not Be Taken On Same Day.
The ‘Book Now’ button will take you to Fly Australia’s Website, where you can book this combo. Once you have booked, please follow the instructions in the email to book your boat tour with us
The Boat ” Super Flyer “
Originally named Susie O’Neill
Experience adventure and comfort aboard
, sun lounges, an onboard bar, and two bathrooms for maximum comfort. Its advanced navigation and radar ensure safe, smooth journeys. Super Flyer offers unlimited
, guided walks, snorkelling adventures, and buffet lunches, making every tour unforgettable.
Built for performance and guest comfort
, Super Flyer delivers fast, exciting, and memorable Whitsundays experiences.
Large inside area with comfortable seating
2 Outside Seating Areas
Adults Only Area Outside On Top Deck
Onboard Bar (pay onboard)
Coffee Machine (pay onboard)
Small Family Business With A Big Boat!
ZigZag Whitsundays and Super Flyer are proudly owned and operated by a local family from Airlie Beach, Queensland. We’re passionate about creating a fun, family-style experience that sets us apart from corporate-run tours. Our crew members are handpicked for their love of the ocean, nature, people and the islands Step aboard and discover why our guests leave such glowing reviews—we’re all about authentic, down-to-earth adventures with a personal touch.
Depart from Coral Sea Marina, Airlie Beach.
Enjoy a guided walk to the
and relax on the beach.
Snorkel Stop (if applicable)
: Explore the vibrant coral reefs of the Whitsundays.
Savor a fresh buffet lunch prepared onboard.
Arrive back at Coral Sea Marina at approximately 5:00 PM.
Why Choose ZigZag Whitsundays?
Our knowledgeable crew will enhance your experience with fun and informative commentary.
We actively participate in conservation programs for the Great Barrier Reef.
Experience breathtaki
=== TOUR END: Whitehaven Beach Tour ===
[ALL PRICE LINES FOUND IN HTML:]

DOES ZIGZAG WHITEHAVEN BEACH TOUR DEPART FROM ?","url":"https://g.page/ZigZagWhitsundays?share","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"ZigZag departs from Coral Sea Marina North End Village at meeting point B. You need to be at this meeting point at 8 am"}},{"@type":"Question","name":"WHAT IS INCLUDED ON THIS WHITEHAVEN BEACH TOUR ?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Snacks, Lunch, Wetsuit, Mask, Snorkel, Fins, Windproof Jacket, Drinking Water (bring your own bottle)"}},{"@type":"Question","name":"WHERE DOES THE TOUR GO?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Whitehaven Beach, South Whitehaven Lookout, Snorkel Locations, "}},{"@type":"Question","name":"DOES WHITEHAVEN BEACH HAVE TOILETS?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"There are toilets at the south end of Whitehaven Beach that are self-composting (long drop). The boat ZigZag also has an onboard bathroom."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"DOES WHITEHAVEN BEACH HAVE STINGERS ? (JELLYFISH)","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Part of living in North Queensland is marine stingers or \"jellyfish\" the months from October to May are stinger season. We do always recommend using a stinger suit during these months."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"CAN YOU STAY AT WHITEHAVEN BEACH?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes! there is a campsite at the south end of Whitehaven beach, however, you will need to take drinking water and your food for the length of your stay, the only facilities provided are composting toilets."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"WHY IS WHITEHAVEN BEACH SO WHITE ?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Whitehaven Beach is created from 98% silica, this silica makes the sand an extraordinary white colour and an unusually light texture feel. To this day no one including scientist now where this sand originated from."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"WHERE IS WHITEHAVEN BEACH?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Whitehaven Beach is located on the eastern side of Whitsundays Island  Queensland Australia 4802"}},{"@type":"Question","name":"HOW LONG IS WHITEHAVEN BEACH","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"The beach officially measures just over 7km long."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"WHY IS WHITEHAVEN BEACH FAMOUS ?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"There are a few reasons, surrounded by tropical islands, not on the mainland with no roads to access the beach means it's uninhabited and of course, The white sand is different from other beaches with its white powdery silica sand and crystal clear waters. "}},{"@type":"Question","name":"HOW FAR IS THE SOUTH LOOKOUT WALK","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"This walk is 900 meters in each direction, its normally a 45 minute round trip including time at the top"}},{"@type":"Question","name":"WHY IS IT CALLED WHITEHAVEN BEACH","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"The beach was identified and discovered in 1879 by Staff Commander EP Bedwell. Whitehaven Beach was named after an English town of the same name."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"WHAT CAN I TAKE ON THE TOUR","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"In a small daypack, it's best to pack sunglasses, suntan lotion, a towel, and swimmers. No large bags or suitcases are allowed onboard"}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Do you cater for Vegans etc ?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes, we cater for, Vegans, Vegetarians, Gluten-Free, Lactose-Free. there will be a question about diets at the time of booking."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"HOW FAR IS WHITEHAVEN BEACH FROM AIRLIE BEACH","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"The distance by boat from Airlie Beach To Whitehaven Beach is 27 nautical miles. "}},{"@type":"Question","name":"SHOULD I BOOK WHITEHAVEN BEACH TICKETS IN ADVANCE","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes especially if you are visiting during school holidays as these tours can book out a week in advance. ZigZag Whitsundays Day Tour also offers cheaper tickets to those who book early."}}]},[{"@type":"CollectionPage","@id":"https://zigzagwhitsundays.com.au/whitehaven-beach-tour/#page","url":"https://zigzagwhitsundays.com.au/whitehaven-beach-tour/","name":"Whitehaven Beach Tours \u2013 Compare Options with ZigZag Whitsundays","inLanguage":"en-AU","description":"Compare Whitehaven Beach tours from Airlie Beach and book direct with ZigZag Whitsundays. name: South Whitehaven Beach Lookout
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: South Whitehaven Beach Lookout ===
1. Whitehaven Beach All Day
2. Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling
3. Sea and Sky Combo
Airlie Beach Scenic Flight Package
Terms and conditions of travel
Refund & Cancellation Policy
Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise
South Whitehaven Beach Lookout
© ZigZag Whitsundays Official Website
How to Visit the South Whitehaven Lookout?
ZigZag Whitsundays offers access to the South Whitehaven Lookout as part of our tours aboard Super Flyer. Choose from the following ticket options for an unforgettable experience:
Whitehaven Beach All Day
Adults From $229 | Children 4+ $179 | Age 1 to 3 Free
4 to 5 Hours at Whitehaven Beach! Spend your day lounging on the pristine sands of Whitehaven Beach, discover the South Whitehaven Lookout, and enjoy the comforts of the boat with on-demand water taxi between the Boat & Whitehaven Beach
South Whitehaven Beach + South Lookout
Full details are available on the product page.
On-Demand Water Taxi Between Boat And Beach
2 Outdoor Sun Lounge Areas
Ticket Price Includes  Lunch, Snacks, Stinger Suit
100% Refund up to 24 hours before departure.
Whitehaven Beach Plus 1 Snorkel Location
Adults From $259 | Children 5+ $199
Get the best of both worlds with ZigZag Whitsundays’ Whitehaven Beach + Snorkel Tour! Enjoy over 2 hours at Whitehaven Beach including the South Lookout.—plus an unforgettable snorkelling experience.
1 Snorkelling Location On Coral Reef
Ticket Price Includes Lunch, Snacks , Stinger Suit and Snorkel Equipment
Sea and Sky Combo – Beach And Snorkel
Adults From $469 | Children $449
Experience the best of the Whitsundays by Sea and Sky with this ultimate combo! Spend the day exploring
aboard Super Flyer. Top it off with a
t over the Whitsundays, including breathtaking views of the Great Barrier Reef, Heart Reef, and Hill Inlet.
Ticket For Our Whitehaven Beach Plus 1 Snorkel Location
Open Dated Ticket For 60 Minute Scenic Flight With FlyAus
Guaranteed Window Seat (Flight)
Snorkelling Included On Boat Tour
Both Tours Can Not Be Taken On Same Day.
The ‘Book Now’ button will take you to Fly Australia’s Website, where you can book this combo. Once you have booked, please follow the instructions in the email to book your boat tour with us
Things To Know Before Visiting
Key Information for Visitors:
South Whitehaven Beach has picnic tables, shaded areas, and composting toilets, making it convenient for day visitors.
To preserve the pristine environment, visitors are encouraged to follow Leave No Trace principles, including taking all rubbish with them and sticking to designated paths to protect native flora and fauna.
Experiencing the South Whitehaven Beach Lookout is a highlight for many visitors to the Whitsundays, and once you visit you will understand why.
The Boat ” Super Flyer “
Originally named Susie O’Neill
Experience adventure and comfort aboard
, sun lounges, an onboard bar, and two bathrooms for maximum comfort. Its advanced navigation and radar ensure safe, smooth journeys. Super Flyer offers unlimited
, guided walks, snorkelling adventures, and buffet lunches, making every tour unforgettable.
Built for performance and guest comfort
, Super Flyer delivers fast, exciting, and memorable Whitsundays experiences.
Large inside area with comfortable seating
2 Outside Seating Areas
Adults Only Area Outside On Top Deck
Onboard Bar (pay onboard)
Coffee Machine (pay onboard)
10 Facts About Whitehaven Beach
1. Unlike most beaches in the world Whitehaven is made of 98% pure silica sand, which gives the beach a stunning white colour.
2. The whiteness of the silica sand makes the sand cool to touch even on the hottest days, walking barefoot is a breeze.
3. The rocks around the beach contain no silica, meaning all this sand was washed here by tides thousands of years ago.
4. All of the plants and animals are the same as you find on the mainland because the Islands haven’t been separated from the mainland for long enough for any kind of evolutionary changes to happen
and Whitehaven tend to have less dense growth and d
=== TOUR END: South Whitehaven Beach Lookout ===

name: Airlie Beach Snorkelling Tour
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Airlie Beach Snorkelling Tour ===
1. Whitehaven Beach All Day
2. Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkelling
3. Sea and Sky Combo
Airlie Beach Scenic Flight Package
Terms and conditions of travel
Refund & Cancellation Policy
Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise
Airlie Beach Snorkelling Tour
© ZigZag Whitsundays Official Website
Looking for the best Airlie Beach snorkelling tour ? ZigZag Whitsundays offers daily departures from Coral Sea Marina, Airlie Beach, combining snorkelling, Whitehaven Beach, and the South Whitehaven Lookout for an unforgettable adventure.
Top-quality snorkel equipment is provided in the price and includes
Flotation devices if necessary.
Snorkelling Adventures – Perfect for Everyone
Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkel
Get the best of both worlds with ZigZag Whitsundays’ Whitehaven Beach + Snorkel Tour! Enjoy over 2 hours at Whitehaven Beach including the South Lookout, plus an unforgettable snorkelling experience.
Sea & Sky Combo - Whitehaven + Snorkel
Whitehaven Beach All Day
Our Airlie Beach snorkelling tour is designed to cater to all experience levels. Guests booked for snorkelling will be picked up from
by the original ZigZag fast boat, featuring
, padded seats, and easy front boarding stairs for seamless water access.
of snorkelling at a prime Whitsundays reef location, handpicked by our experienced crew based on the day’s wind, tides, and conditions. Expect to see vibrant coral gardens, tropical fish, turtles, and even Nemo!
Why Choose Super Flyer for Snorkelling?
Travelling with non-snorkellers? No problem! Guests can choose
Whitehaven Beach All-Day Tickets
while snorkellers enjoy their underwater adventure—everyone stays on the same tour!
Super Flyer features air-conditioned indoor seating, sun lounges, and an onboard bar for ultimate comfort.
We provide premium gear, including
Tusa silicone masks, wetsuits, snorkels
for the best underwater experience.
Meet at Coral Sea Marina, Airlie Beach.
Enjoy a guided walk to the
, explore the beach, and relax.
Snorkel at a prime reef location for 60 minutes.
Freshly prepared and served onboard.
Arrive back at Coral Sea Marina by approximately
Why Snorkel with ZigZag Whitsundays?
Professional, friendly crew with expert local knowledge.
Flotation devices and crew monitoring ensure safety at all times.
Active participants in Great Barrier Reef conservation projects.
What’s Included on your Airlie Beach Snorkelling Tour?
✅ Professional snorkel gear (mask, snorkel, fins, wetsuit)
✅ Flotation devices and rescue boards
✅ Buffet lunch and snacks
✅ Fully guided snorkelling experience
✅ Transfers between Super Flyer and snorkel site
✅ Onboard bar and sun lounges for non-snorkellers
The Boat ” Super Flyer “
Originally named Susie O’Neill
Experience adventure and comfort aboard
, sun lounges, an onboard bar, and two bathrooms for maximum comfort. Its advanced navigation and radar ensure safe, smooth journeys. Super Flyer offers unlimited
, guided walks, snorkelling adventures, and buffet lunches, making every tour unforgettable.
Built for performance and guest comfort
, Super Flyer delivers fast, exciting, and memorable Whitsundays experiences.
Large inside area with comfortable seating
Full details are available on the product page.
2 Outside Seating Areas
Adults Only Area Outside On Top Deck
Onboard Bar (pay onboard)
Coffee Machine (pay onboard)
Small Family Business With A Big Boat!
ZigZag Whitsundays and Super Flyer are proudly owned and operated by a local family from Airlie Beach, Queensland. We’re passionate about creating a fun, family-style experience that sets us apart from corporate-run tours. Our crew members are handpicked for their love of the ocean, nature, people and the islands Step aboard and discover why our guests leave such glowing reviews—we’re all about authentic, down-to-earth adventures with a personal touch.
Depart from Coral Sea Marina, Airlie Beach.
and relax on the beach.
Snorkel Stop (if applicable)
: Explore the vibrant coral reefs of the Whitsundays.
Savor a fresh buffet lunch prepared onboard.

=== TOUR END: Airlie Beach Snorkelling Tour ===
[ALL PRICE LINES FOUND IN HTML:]
